info: TSH rises when thyroid function is low and falls when thyroid function is high.

low_interpretation: Low T3 – hypothyroidism or non-thyroidal illness
info: T3 reflects metabolic activity — high in overactive thyroid and low in underactive or sick states.
Measures overall thyroid hormone production — high means overactive thyroid, low means underactive.

low_interpretation: Low T4U – increased TBG, possible hypothyroidism
high_interpretation: High T4U – decreased TBG, possible hyperthyroidism
info: Indicates thyroid-binding protein activity — low in hypothyroidism, high in hyperthyroidism.
Reflects true thyroid hormone activity — high in hyperthyroidism, low in hypothyroidism.

low_interpretation: Low TBG – decreased binding capacity, possible protein deficiency
high_interpretation: High TBG – increased binding capacity, possible estrogen effect or liver disease
info: Affects total thyroid hormone levels — doesn’t change actual thyroid function.
